age_at_offence.source: After all, he was 21 years old at the time, not a very young teenager.

age_at_sentencing.source: The defendant is now 23 years old and had a clear record.

gender.source: After finishing school, he became an elevator repair apprentice and had a full-time job, but the COVID pandemic affected his employment and he was made redundant.

household_composition.source: The defendant lived there with his parents and younger brother.

occupation.source: But at the time of his arrest, he was unemployed.

monthly_wage.source: But at the time of his arrest, he was unemployed.

criminal_record.source: The defendant is now 23 years old and had a clear record.

family_support.source: I do have a mitigation letter from the defendant’s parents who are very supportive and accept the defendant’s remorse as genuine.
